hanzi-su-wiki:
箇

Значения

Штука, отдельный; счётный суффикс для предметов

Мнемоника

Прочные 固, т.е. давно производимые изделия из бамбука 竹.

Варианты

個, 个, ヶ
purpleculture_pinyin:
gè
general classifier
общий классификатор
rtega_mnemonic:
箇箇RSnumerary adjunct, piece, single
  • a strong and hard 固 single piece of unbroken bamboo ⺮
heisig_constituent: item, bamboo, harden, pent in, old, tombstone, gravestone, church, ten, needle, mouth
koohiiStory1: Dragon Quest - You find a hardened bamboo stick, perfect for a weapon, but you can´t pick it up because your items are full.
koohiiStory2: You´ve entered in a chinese shop where apparently the only item in sale is old, dusty, hardened bamboo (for construction for example). It looks like these items have been there forever. Asking the clerk if anything else is available, he doesn´t understand and instead asks - "Two items? Three items?" (the kanji is a counter for items) - thinking you want to buy something.
jp_example_words:
箇所(かしょ): passage, place, point, part
箇条書き(かじょうがき): itemized form, itemization
箇箇(ここ): individual, separate
Ru_Notes:
Фонетик: 固 (かためる、コ твёрдый), 古 (ふるい、コ старый).
Аналог: 個 (コ、カ отдельный, индивидуальный).
Ru_Radicals: 十 (десять), 口 (рот), 囗 (коробка), 竹 (бамбук)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: it's a hard (固) bamboo (⺮) item
humanum_full_description_en:
From " bamboo " to " solid " sound, the original meaning is bamboo branch. "Shuowen": "Bamboo Meiye. From bamboo, solid sound." "Dialect" twelfth: "Xie, Meiye." Guo Pu's note: "That is the number of pieces."

The literature rarely has the original usage of "箇", which is mostly used as a quantifier. "Book of Rites‧ Shaoyi": "For the ceremony, Da Lao uses the left shoulder and arm of a cow to fold the nine arms, Shao Lao uses the left shoulder of the sheep and seven arms, and the hog uses the left shoulder of the pig."

" Xie " can also be used as a pronoun to express this or that. Tang Bai Juyi's "Self-Ying": "Any husband, his heart is stubborn?"

" Xie " can also be used as an auxiliary word to express the estimation of a certain state. Tang Hanyu "Pen Pond": "The old man Zhenxie is like a child. He draws water to bury the basin as a small pond."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " bamboo ", " solid ", the original meaning is bamboo branches.
humanum_full_description:
從「竹」，「固」聲，本義為竹枝。《說文》：「竹枚也。从竹，固聲。」《方言》第十二：「箇，枚也。」郭璞注：「謂枚數也。」

　　文獻鮮有「箇」的本義用法，多用作量詞。《禮記‧少儀》：「其禮，大牢則以牛左肩臂臑折九箇，少牢則以羊左肩七箇，犆豕則以豕左肩五箇。」

　　「箇」也可用作代詞，表示這、那。唐白居易〈自詠〉：「咄哉箇丈夫，心性任墮頑？」

　　「箇」還可用作助詞，表示對某種狀態的估量。唐韓愈〈盆池〉：「老翁真箇似童兒，汲水埋盆作小池。」

從「 竹 」，「 固 」聲，本義為竹枝。《說文》：「竹枚也。从竹，固聲。」《方言》第十二：「箇，枚也。」郭璞注：「謂枚數也。」 文獻鮮有「 箇 」的本義用法，多用作量詞。《禮記‧少儀》：「其禮，大牢則以牛左肩臂臑折九箇，少牢則以羊左肩七箇，犆豕則以豕左肩五箇。」 「 箇 」也可用作代詞，表示這、那。唐白居易〈自詠〉：「咄哉箇丈夫，心性任墮頑？」 「 箇 」還可用作助詞，表示對某種狀態的估量。唐韓愈〈盆池〉：「老翁真箇似童兒，汲水埋盆作小池。」
From " bamboo" to " solid" sound, the original meaning is bamboo branch. "Shuowen": "Bamboo Meiye. From bamboo, solid sound." "Dialect" twelfth: "Xie, Meiye." Guo Pu's note: "That is the number of pieces." The literature rarely has the original usage of " 箇", which is mostly used as a quantifier. "Book of Rites‧ Shaoyi": "For the ceremony, Da Lao uses the left shoulder and arm of a cow to fold the nine arms, Shao Lao uses the left shoulder of the sheep and seven arms, and the hog uses the left shoulder of the pig." " Xie" can also be used as a pronoun to express this or that. Tang Bai Juyi's "Self-Ying": "Any husband, his heart is stubborn?" " Xie" can also be used as an auxiliary word to express the estimation of a certain state. Tang Hanyu "Pen Pond": "The old man Zhenxie is like a child. He draws water to bury the basin as a small pond."

箇字的基本解释

箇
gè
同“个1”。
姓。

箇字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gè］
［《廣韻》古賀切，去箇，見。］
(1)竹一枝。
(2)引申为量词。
(3)指示代词。这；那。
(4)助词。用以估量某种光景。

箇字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【竹字部】　箇； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页886第36
【廣韻】古賀切【集韻】【韻會】居賀切。【正韻】古荷切，?音吤。數也。　又【揚子·方言】箇，枚也。【郭註】爲枚數也。【荀子·議兵篇】負矢五十箇。　【集韻】亦作个、介。俗作個。

字源演变：
